briefTitle: Nuevo Amanecer: Promoting the Psychosocial Health of Latinas
officialTitle: Nuevo Amanecer: Promoting the Psychosocial Health of Latinas
primaryOutcomeMeasure: Physical Well-being a Subcale of the Functional Assessment of Cancer Therapy-Breast Quality of Life Instrument (FACT-B)
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Self-identifies as Latina
* Diagnosed with Stage 0, I, II, or III in the prior month
* Primarily Spanish-speaking, or Spanish monolingual
* Aged 18 or older
* Diagnosed in Alameda, Contra Costa, San Mateo, San Francisco or Santa Clara counties, California.

Exclusion Criteria:

* Previous cancer diagnosis except for non-melanoma skin cancer
* Terminal illness
* Stage IV breast cancer (distant metastasis)
